creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: woven center panel with two wide horizontal sections in black and red, divided by narrow horizontal sections in green, black, white, blue and red; 3" blue satin bands on both ends with bright floral design on right side only in reds, orange, blue, greens, purple; 1-1/2" embroidered band at each end in pink, blue, green, white; two-part fringe at each corner in green, blue, pink, red, attached with 1/4" netting stitch; top left fringe has reversed bottom tassel
title: Scarf
